channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Image Tag Parameter Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Image Tag Parameter Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34189|2024-08-03T08:16:17.260Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20image%20tag%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Image Tag Parameter Plugin 1.10 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Image Tag parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
